description: Track daily water intake and compare to hydration goals, helping maintain proper hydration levels

amount_ml.description: Amount of water consumed in milliliters

date.description: Date of water intake (YYYY-MM-DD, defaults to today)

daily_goal_ml.description: Daily water intake goal in ml (default: 2000ml)

reset_daily_total.description: If true, reset and start new daily total

get_summary.description: If true, return daily summary instead of logging
